title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 6
itunes:title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 6
description:
We're live! Chad and Simon debut a new live recording session of The Favorites, available every week on the free Amp app or via the web at onamp.com for the rest of this NFL season! Just follow @TheFavorites on Amp to join our live show recordings every Tuesday at 1:30pm ET and every Thursday at 11am ET. 

This week, Chad and Simon use their Action Network data to dive into the best bets for NFL Week 6, including a long look at the Steelers and the Dolphins, plus a potential buy on the suddenly resurgent New York Jets. #Volume #herd #colincowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
